thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 8 of 260
thread.title: Daniel

author: Daniel
title: Daniel
text: On March 12th I placed an order for four items of which I received three in about a week. The fourth item shows that a label has been made for it but no other activity is showing after ten days on Fedex tracking. Where is my order? I have purchased from Groupon before, although I can't say the service is stellar it doesn't deserve a one star. As for this experience there is no excuse. Fedex is eating away your reliability.
